item.title: Ultimate X-Men, Vol. 14: Phoenix?
item.description:
Split volume:

Part one, everyone is going on dates and super horny. Comics yo. Thereâ€™s some serious damage under the surface there though. Nightcrawler. Wolverine. Rogue.

Part two, some cult is looking for the Phoenix and may just have found it in Jean. Now what?

Interesting enough. Onward!
